sqlMap.statement: SELECT DOMAINNM AS "DOMAINNM" , DOMAINTYPE AS "DOMAINTYPE", DOMAINOPTION AS "DOMAINOPTION", DOMAINVAL AS "DOMAINVAL" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM23 WHERE DOMAINNM = #domainNM#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAICM23 (DOMAINNM, DOMAINTYPE, DOMAINOPTION, DOMAINVAL) VALUES( #domainNM#, #domainType#,#domainOption#, #domainVal#)

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAICM23 SET DOMAINTYPE = #domainType#, DOMAINOPTION = #domainOption#, DOMAINVAL = #domainVal#
WHERE DOMAINNM = #domainNM#
